original_text: In another dream, I also saw seven groups of grain that grew on one branch. The grains were fat and good.
korean_text: 다시 꿈에 보니 한 줄기에 무성하고 충실한 일곱 이삭이 나오고

sentences.original_text: I also saw seven groups of grain
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 곡식의 일곱 묶음을 보았고

sentences.original_text: The grains were fat and good
